short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Simpsons Wallpaper turn new tab to HD custom The Simpsons background. The Simpsons wallpaper themes for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Refresh your The Simpsons wallpaper with each new tab you open.
2. Choose or randomize your The Simpsons background via the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Quick links to email and social media platforms.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. Create new notes to keep track of your tasks.
7. Quick access to your frequently visited websites.
8. Direct link to your bookmarks.
9. Add websites to the Shortcut panel for faster access.
10. Instant access to Google applications.
11. Effortless navigation to More Themes.
12. Simplified sharing to social networks.
13. Easy download of new wallpapers.
14. Quick links to gaming portals.
15. Activate entertaining animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your The Simpsons new tab.
